movie.title: A Private War
movie.plot: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontlines of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.

events.title: Marie Colvin loses one of her eyes in an explosion
Marie Colvin is killed by an IED
